name: No Copy
author: S H Mohanjith

sections.description: No Copy plugin is a upload and activate plugin which prevents visitors the context menu (right click) on your blog. This should prevent plagirism by most users. However there are many means to copy a site without using the context menu.
sections.installation:
1. Upload no-copy to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to view the content in a blog where No Copy is installed?

Go to ‘View’ -> ‘Page Source’ in most browsers. Ctrl+U also works in most Mozilla based browsers, if not all.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.4

  • Now you can’t even select the text

Version 1.1.3

  • Compatibility with WordPress 3.0

Version 1.1.2

  • Tested with WordPress 2.8.4

Version 1.1.1

  • Disable no-copy for administrator

Version 1.1.0

  • Disable Ctrl+A, Ctrl+C, Ctrl+X

Version 1.0.0

  • Initial release
